        @Deprecated
public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDisabledPlugins()
        Deprecated. Bad API, sorry. Please use PluginManagerCore.isDisabled(PluginId) to check plugin's state, PluginManagerCore.disabledPlugins() to get an unmodifiable collection of all disabled plugins (rarely needed).
